pegg.prime package¬∂

Submodules¬∂

pegg.prime.crisporEffScores module¬∂

class pegg.prime.crisporEffScores.ScoreCache(scoreName)¬∂

Bases: object

a cache of eff scores, kept on disk. Can avoid slow calculations by keeping the value of the score in a tab-sep file.

findNewSeqs(seqs)¬∂

get seqs that are not in cache. If all are, return the list of scores. Otherwise return None for the scores. Returns tuple (seqs, scores)

mergeIntoCache(newScores)¬∂
pegg.prime.crisporEffScores.calcAziScore(seqs)¬∂

the official implementation of the Doench2016 (aka Fusi) score from Microsoft

pegg.prime.crisporEffScores.getBinPath(name, isDir=False)¬∂

get the full pathname of a platform-specific binary, in the bin/ directory relative to this directory

pegg.prime.crisporEffScores.readDict(fname, isFloat=True)¬∂

read dict from a tab sep file

pegg.prime.crisporEffScores.seqToVec(seq, offsets={'A': 0, 'C': 1, 'G': 2, 'T': 3})¬∂
